nodes.text: Ana Tolla was a female smuggler who led a crew by the time of the war between the First Order and the Resistance. Tolla made a name for herself in the galaxy by successfully completing jobs no one else would take. Around 34 ABY, Tolla and her crew traveled to a cantina on the Outer Rim planet Actlyon following a mission. After receiving refreshments, Tolla hastily departed Actlyon with her crew, choosing to leave their colleague Izal Garsea behind.

Damar Olin, the partner of Izal Garsea, abandoned her, joining Tolla's crew. Some time later, the crew encountered Garsea in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu, where they attempted to destroy the farm of Kat Saka. With the help of Garsea's childhood friend Julen Rakab and several residents of Batuu, Tolla's plan was unsuccessful. Tolla attempted to detonate the bombs she had planted around the farm while she and her crew were still present, but she was stopped by Oksan, one member of her crew.
Ana Tolla appeared in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova.
